name: knox-sync-plugin
description: Sync your vault with knox portal.

scripts.build: bun run build:plugin -- --outfile=dist/main.js && bun run build:manifest
scripts.build:plugin: bun build src/knox/main.ts --bundle --target node --format cjs --external obsidian --external electron
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
